subtitles.text: It's time for another episode of Upcomi, this time with Rei Inoue of Juice-Juice and Kokoro Maeda of Beyonds and Amemori Kawa!
This is a program that takes you behind the scenes of the production of various artists belonging to the Upfront Group.
We'll be showing you the process of recording, rehearsals, and other production processes of our artists.
I, Inoue, am a fan of Juice-Juice.
Juice-Juice celebrated the 10th anniversary of their major label debut on September 11!
I, Inoue, am very happy to hear that.
Thank you very much.
Thank you very much.
We had an event.
There were many members who were making toasts for the first time in a long time, which made me very happy.
It was a bit emotional and emo.
It was really a very stimulating 3 days.
Yes, I'm going to talk about the 25th anniversary concert.
It was really a gorgeous concert with many original members performing.
I was watching the performance from the backstage, and I was so moved that I had goosebumps all the time.
I was so moved that I couldn't stop getting goosebumps.
I was so moved that I couldn't stop the goosebumps from coming out of my mouth.
Even after the show was over, I was so immersed in the afterglow that I kept looking back at the video footage.
It was a really fun experience for me.
Beyonds sang a super happy song with Mr. Elijah.
He was so kind to me from the rehearsal.
Also, Airi Suzuki and Maimi Yajima of ℃-ute sang a song by ℃-ute with the current members.

I was also very happy to hear that Airi Suzuki and Maimi Yajima from ℃-ute were singing songs by ℃-ute with the current members, and they said that they would sing together with me someday. I am very happy to hear that they are encouraging the current members to sing together, and I will do my best more and more since we became a principle member.
